summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal water supply system; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights in portions of Township 26 North, Range 7 East, W. M., Township 26 North, Range 6 East, W. M., Township 26 North, Range 5 East, W. M., and in Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W. M., for maintenance roadways appurtenant to, and the widening of a segment of, the watermain pipeline right of way heretofore acquired by condemnation under Ordinance 86134, all as a part of the additions and betterments to the existing system contemplated by Ordinance 87150.
